title: 2.021 NUMBER OF MEMBERS.
text: For each legislature, until a new apportionment shall have been made, the senate is composed of 67 members and the house of representatives is composed of 134 members.

variables.name: senate_members
variables.description: The number of members in the senate.

variables.name: house_members
variables.description: The number of members in the house of representatives.

consequences: The legislature is correctly apportioned with 67 senate members and 134 house members.
